lead_paragraph: Former Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi's family company is likely to open exclusive talks next week with a group of Chinese investors interested in buying AC Milan soccer club, one of his most cherished assets, a source said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Italy's Berlusconi Warming to Chinese Bid for AC Milan: Source
headline.main: Italy's Berlusconi Warming to Chinese Bid for AC Milan: Source

snippet: Former Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi's family company is likely to open exclusive talks next week with a group of Chinese investors interested in buying AC Milan soccer club, one of his most cherished assets, a source said on Saturday....
